channel.title: Delay read-> outputs tics or samplerate
channel.description: As i look at the code of delay write "menu" i think it should be possible to output the choosen delay time as ticks or samplerate.or sec But how? Also i found that the strings start with 8 wich is 256samples, so it should be possible to go even further down to 1,2,4,8..... sample, so maybe an input to choose the delaytime would be practical to.

item.title: Delay read-> outputs tics or samplerate
item.dc:creator: @philoop
item.description:
@philoop wrote:

contrib/phi/delay/delay write sdram kticks.
I made also delayss with ms an sec output.

Read full topic
item.source: Delay read-> outputs tics or samplerate
